commit.message:
Applied suggestion to use StringUTF16.compress in append() for copying char[].
Added similar improvement to putCharsAt.

Optimize StringUTF16.putCharsAt a bit.
Fixup hotspot Helper of putCharsAt to remove return value to match StringUTF16.putCharsAt.

Added missing bugid to tests
Applied review suggestions.
Added convenience methods to StringLatin1 for 4 and 5 character literals to leverage optimizations for merged stores.
Updated missing copyright years.

8351443: Refactor AbstractStringBuilder to maintain consistency between
count, coder, and value buffers while the buffer capacity is
being expanded and/or inflated from Latin1 to UTF16 representations.
ASB fields are only updated in the public methods.
Support methods are designed to pass all arguments in as locals
and return any modified values.
The value buffer undergoes an inflation from LATIN1 to UTF16 when
needed to store UTF16 values.

Add SBStressTest, a randomized, multi-thread exerciser of unsynchronized StringBuilders.
StressSBTest exercises most public instance methods of StringBuilder.
A single StringBuilder is modified concurrently by a number of threads.
